snippet: The Booming blog has responses from a certified financial planner to retirement planning questions from readers.
abstract: The Booming blog has responses from a certified financial planner to retirement planning questions from readers.
lead_paragraph: Our colleagues on Booming invited readers to submit questions about financial planning for retirement to Doug Wheat, a certified financial planner with Family Wealth Management, based in western Massachusetts. The first set of replies is now online. Read more »
